trans-unit.source: Provides helper methods used by session-state modules and session-state store providers to manage session information for an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Gir helper metoder som brukes i status for økten moduler og status for økten lagre leverandører for å behandle økten informasjon for en ASP.NET-programmet.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: The SessionStateUtility class provides static helper methods that are used by a session-state module or a session-state store provider.
trans-unit.target: Klassen SessionStateUtility inneholder statisk helper metoder som brukes av en status for økten modul eller et status for økten lagerleverandøren.

trans-unit.source: Application developers will not need to call these methods from their code.
trans-unit.target: Utviklere programmer trenger ikke å kalle disse metodene fra koden.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the ways the session-state module and session-state store provider use the methods.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor beskriver hvordan status for økten modul og status for økten lagerleverandøren bruke metodene.

trans-unit.source: |Method|Use| |------------|---------| |<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility.GetHttpSessionStateFromContext%2A> method|Can be used by custom session-state modules to either retrieve session information for an existing session or create session information for a new session.| |<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility.AddHttpSessionStateToContext%2A> method|Called by the session-state module to add the session data to the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> and make it available to application code through the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A> property.| |<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility.RemoveHttpSessionStateFromContext%2A> method|Called by the session-state module during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.ReleaseRequestState> or <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> events at the end of a request, to clear session data from the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.| |<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility.GetSessionStaticObjects%2A> method|Called by the session-state module to get a reference to the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState.StaticObjects%2A> collection based on objects defined in the Global.asax file.
trans-unit.target: | Metoden | Bruk | |------------|---------| | <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility.GetHttpSessionStateFromContext%2A>metoden | Egendefinert status for økten moduler kan brukes til hente informasjon om en eksisterende økt økter eller opprette økten informasjon for en ny økt. | | <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility.AddHttpSessionStateToContext%2A>metoden | Kalles av status for økten modulen som skal legge til data i økten gjeldende <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>og gjøre den tilgjengelig for programmet kode via egenskapen <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A>. | | <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility.RemoveHttpSessionStateFromContext%2A>metoden | Kalles av status for økten modulen under <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.ReleaseRequestState>eller <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest>hendelser på slutten av en forespørsel om å fjerne økten data fra gjeldende <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>. | | <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility.GetSessionStaticObjects%2A>metoden | Kalles av status for økten modulen som skal hente en referanse til det <xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState.StaticObjects%2A>samling basert på objekter som er definert i filen Global.asax.</xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState.StaticObjects%2A> </xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility.GetSessionStaticObjects%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.ReleaseRequestState> </xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility.RemoveHttpSessionStateFromContext%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility.AddHttpSessionStateToContext%2A> </xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility.GetHttpSessionStateFromContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection> collection returned is included with the session data added to the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.| Session data is passed to and retrieved from the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> as an <xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionStateContainer> object or any valid implementation of the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState> interface.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen <xref:System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection>returnerte er inkludert i økten data som er lagt til gjeldende <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>. | Økten data er sendt til og hentet fra gjeldende <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>som en <xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionStateContainer>objekt eller en gyldig implementering av den <xref:System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState> </xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionStateContainer> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection>

trans-unit.source: For information about implementing a session-state store provider, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Se for informasjon om implementering av en status for økten lagringstjeneste [implementere status for økten lagre leverandør](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Applies the session data to the context for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Datatypen økten til i konteksten for gjeldende forespørsel.

trans-unit.source: The AddHttpSessionStateToContext method is used by a session-state module to apply session data to the current request.
trans-unit.target: Metoden AddHttpSessionStateToContext brukes av en status for økten modul til å bruke økten data til gjeldende forespørsel.

trans-unit.source: This occurs during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AcquireRequestState> event at the beginning of a request.
trans-unit.target: Dette forekommer i løpet av <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AcquireRequestState>hendelsen på begynnelsen av en forespørsel.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AcquireRequestState>

trans-unit.source: Session data for the current request is either retrieved for an existing session or created for a new session.
trans-unit.target: Øktdata for den gjeldende forespørselen hentes for en eksisterende økt eller er opprettet for en ny økt.

trans-unit.source: The session data is then encapsulated in an <xref:System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState> implementation instance, which is passed to the AddHttpSessionStateToContext method along with the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: Datatypen økten deretter innkapslet i en <xref:System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState>implementering forekomsten som er sendt til metoden AddHttpSessionStateToContext sammen med gjeldende <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState>

trans-unit.source: The supplied session data is then made available to application code through the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A> property of the current context.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte økten data deretter gjøres tilgjengelig for programmet kode via den <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A>for gjeldende kontekst.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> object to which to add the <xref href="System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> objektet som skal legges til i <xref href="System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState"></xref> implementation instance to add to the specified HTTP context.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState"> </xref> implementering forekomst til å legge til den angitte HTTP-konteksten.

trans-unit.source: An object for the current session has already been added to the specified context.
trans-unit.target: En objekt for gjeldende økt er allerede lagt til den angitte context .

trans-unit.source: Retrieves session data from the context for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Henter økten data fra konteksten for gjeldende forespørsel.

trans-unit.source: The GetHttpSessionStateFromContext method can be used by a session-state module to retrieve session data from the current request.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetHttpSessionStateFromContext kan brukes av en modul med status for økten for å hente økten data fra gjeldende forespørsel.

trans-unit.source: This occurs during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.ReleaseRequestState> event at the end of a request.
trans-unit.target: Dette forekommer i løpet av <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.ReleaseRequestState>hendelsen på slutten av en forespørsel.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.ReleaseRequestState>

trans-unit.source: The returned session data can then be written to the session data store.
trans-unit.target: Datatypen returnerte økten kan deretter skrives til datakilden for økten.

trans-unit.source: If the session has been abandoned, the session data can be removed from the data store and <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>, and the **Session_OnEnd** event can be executed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis økten har blitt avbrutt, økten-data kan bli fjernet fra datalageret og <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>, og **Session_OnEnd** hendelsen kan utføres.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> from which to retrieve session data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> som skal hente dataene for økten fra.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState"></xref> implementation instance populated with session data from the current request.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState"> </xref> implementering-forekomst som er fylt med økten data fra gjeldende forespørsel.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the static objects collection for the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til samlingen statiske objekter for den angitte konteksten.

trans-unit.source: The GetSessionStaticObjects method is used to retrieve the collection of static objects defined in the Global.asax file for the ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetSessionStaticObjects brukes til å hente samlingen av statiske objekter som er definert i filen Global.asax for ASP.NET-programmet.

trans-unit.source: A session-state module implementation will supply the returned <xref:System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection> collection to the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState> implementation instance that is added to the current context using the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility.AddHttpSessionStateToContext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En status for økten modulen implementering vil angi den returnerte <xref:System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection>samling skal den <xref:System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState>implementering-forekomst som er lagt til i gjeldende kontekst ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility.AddHttpSessionStateToContext%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility.AddHttpSessionStateToContext%2A> </xref:System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState> </xref:System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreProviderBase> can also use the GetSessionStaticObjects method when creating a <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreProviderBase>kan også bruke metoden GetSessionStaticObjects når du oppretter en <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData>objektet.</xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData> </xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreProviderBase>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> from which to get the static objects collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> som skal få statiske objektsamling fra.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection"></xref> collection populated with the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState.StaticObjects*> property value for the specified <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection"> </xref> samlingen fylt med den <xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState.StaticObjects*>egenskapsverdien for den angitte <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState.StaticObjects*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value which indicates whether the session state is read-only for the specified <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som indikerer om økttilstanden skrivebeskyttet for den angitte <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> to check.
trans-unit.target: Angir den <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> å se.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the session state is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis status for økten er skrivebeskyttet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value which indicates whether the session state is required for the specified <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som indikerer om status for økten er nødvendig for den angitte <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> to check.
trans-unit.target: Angir den <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> å se.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the session state is required; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis status for økten er påkrevd. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Executes the **Session_OnEnd** event defined in the Global.asax file for the ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Utfører de **Session_OnEnd** hendelse som er definert i filen Global.asax for ASP.NET-programmet.

trans-unit.source: The RaiseSessionEnd method is used by a session-state module to execute the **Session_OnEnd** event defined in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RaiseSessionEnd brukes av en modul med status for økten til å kjøre den **Session_OnEnd** hendelse som er definert i filen Global.asax for et ASP.NET-program.

trans-unit.source: A session-state module will call the RaiseSessionEnd method when a session has been abandoned, or if the session expires.
trans-unit.target: En status for økten-modul kaller metoden RaiseSessionEnd når en økt som har forlatt eller økten er utløpt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState"></xref> implementation instance for the session that has ended.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState"> </xref> implementering forekomsten for økten er avsluttet.

trans-unit.source: The event source object to supply to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Session_OnEnd" name="Session_OnEnd" href=""></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen kildeobjektet skal gis til den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Session_OnEnd" name="Session_OnEnd" href=""> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EventArgs> object to supply to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Session_OnEnd" name="Session_OnEnd" href=""></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.EventArgs>objektet skal gis til den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Session_OnEnd" name="Session_OnEnd" href=""> </xref> hendelsen.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Removes session data from the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner økten data fra den angitte konteksten.

trans-unit.source: The RemoveHttpSessionStateFromContext method clears session data from the specified <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RemoveHttpSessionStateFromContext tømmes økten data fra den angitte <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: A session-state module will call the RemoveHttpSessionStateFromContext method in the handler for the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.ReleaseRequestState> event.
trans-unit.target: En status for økten-modul kaller metoden RemoveHttpSessionStateFromContext i et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.ReleaseRequestState>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.ReleaseRequestState>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> from which to remove session data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> som skal fjernes økten data fra.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a serialization surrogate selector that is used for session serialization customization.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en serialisering erstatning velger som brukes for økten serialisering tilpasning.

trans-unit.source: A serialization surrogate selector.
trans-unit.target: En serialisering erstatning velger.
